sentences: Las tuleb siia, võtan ta vuntsid pihku 'kutsun ta korrale'.
Kes see vunts siin pildil on?
Ta on naljavend ja üldse vahva vunts.
context: The word 'vunts' in Estonian refers to facial hair, specifically a mustache or beard. It's used to describe the growth of hair above the upper lip (mustache) or on the face more generally (beard). The term can also be used colloquially to refer to men themselves, particularly those with distinctive facial hair.
